---
id: account-movement-async-get
title: "Get the Account Movements Information"
description: "This method returns the Account Movements information cached associated with the given pactualId.  **Returns 1000 transactions per page.**"
sidebar_label: "Get the Account Movements Information"
hide_title: true

sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the Account Movements Information"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/account/movement/async/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method returns the Account Movements information cached associated with the given pactualId.  **Returns 1000 transactions per page.**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","description":"Unique resource Identifier (Uuid) generated by api.","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"page","description":"Page number. (Default 0)","schema":{"format":"int32","type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
